title: Delete last 3 static photos from the gallery

requirements.text: Remove the last 3 static photos from the Gallery page (frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx). The static photos are currently hardcoded as gallery-photo-01.jpeg through gallery-photo-30.jpeg. Remove gallery-photo-28.jpeg, gallery-photo-29.jpeg, and gallery-photo-30.jpeg from the hardcoded static photos array, so that only gallery-photo-01.jpeg through gallery-photo-27.jpeg remain displayed in the photo gallery section.
acceptanceCriteria: gallery-photo-28.jpeg, gallery-photo-29.jpeg, and gallery-photo-30.jpeg are no longer rendered in the Gallery page photo section
gallery-photo-01.jpeg through gallery-photo-27.jpeg continue to display correctly in the photo gallery grid
Dynamically fetched backend photos are unaffected and still displayed correctly
The photo gallery grid layout remains responsive and visually consistent with 27 static photos

constraints: Only remove the last 3 static photo entries (gallery-photo-28.jpeg, gallery-photo-29.jpeg, gallery-photo-30.jpeg) from the hardcoded array; do not remove any other photos or alter backend photo fetching logic
nonGoals: Deleting photos from the backend or any uploaded dynamic photos
Changing the Admin page or any upload functionality
